sectionedDescription.description:
Outstanding sunset views and great location on a quiet cul de sac.

Free cable, free wi-fi, free parking

Weekly Rates, 28 night specials & Last Minute Discounts

Skyline is the perfect vacation home for your entire family. This house is located on a quiet cul-de-sac on the Knoll. It has incredible views of the Monashee Mountains and backs right onto the skiway ‚Äì can‚Äôt get any better than that.

Walk in the front door straight to your open main living area (with the views). This is a perfect area for everyone to gather after an incredible day on the mountain. This floor has a full kitchen, living room, dining area, a washroom with a shower and the main floor hot tub. On this deck, there is also a BBQ for your use.

The den is on the main floor and has a couch and a TV.

From the main living area, head upstairs to all the bedrooms and another bathroom. The has an ensuite and there is another full bathroom on this level.

Bedroom Configuration:

Upper:
Master Bedroom: Queen Bed (sleeps 2) with large ensuite including stand-up shower, claw foot tub with large windows to soak in the view
Bedroom Two: Queen Bed (sleeps 2)
Bedroom Three: Queen Bed (sleeps 2)
Bedroom Four ‚Äì Bunk Room: Two Single/Single Bunk Beds (sleeps 4)
Private Den: Brand New Pullout Couch (sleeps 2) 

Suite:
Bedroom Five: Queen Bed (sleeps 2)
Living Room: Queen Futon (sleeps 2)

Washrooms:
Main Floor Bathroom ‚Äì Full Bathroom with Stand-Up Shower
Bedroom Level Bathroom ‚Äì Full Bathroom with Shower/Tub Combination
Master Ensuite Bathroom ‚Äì Master Ensuite ‚Äì Full Bathroom with Stand-Up Shower and Claw Foot Tub
Suite Bathroom ‚Äì Full Bathroom with Shower/Tub Combination

From the entryway, head downstairs to the fully equipped suite (which is connected via an internal staircase). This suite has a full kitchen, living room and dining room as well as another hot tub. There is also a bedroom (sleeps 2) and futon in the living room for 2 more guests.

This lower level also has extra ski storage and the laundry room.

Skyline has an enviable flat driveway, incredible views of the mountain and enough space for your entire family!

The two hot tubs are operational during the ski season only. 

There are four outdoor parking spots available during your stay and there is an EV charging station available.

Skyline is a fully equipped house with its own laundry facilities. Housekeeping is not included during your stay but if you require additional housekeeping during your stay it can be arranged at an additional cost.

**Important ‚Äì Special Rate Discounts**

Arrive on Sunday - Stay five days... Pay for four - Thursday night is on us.

Weekly rates - One free night. Maximum stay of 31 days in ski season. 

Last Minute Discounts may be available.  If so, the rates have been adjusted to reflect this discount.

Bonus rates and conditions do not apply to Festive holidays. 

Please note if you are wanting to book the weekly special it will auto-quote and you can go ahead and book..  If you are looking for our mid-week - Arrive Sunday and stay 5 nights/pay for 4 nights special, please send us a booking inquiry so we can manually adjust the quote, prior to your booking.  

Last Minute Discounts  may be available.  If so, the rates have been adjusted to reflect this discount.

 Minimum of three nights required all year and five nights during the Christmas/New Years Period (unless there are gaps between bookings)

We are pleased to be able to offer affordable cancellation insurance.  Book with peace of mind. This property is protected with B.C. Consumer Protection Licence #77289. 

What our guests have to say:

"The property was as advertised and worked great for the 10 of us which included 2 infants." - December 2023

Your house is accessed by a keyless lock (you will be provided the access code prior to arrival) so you can arrive anytime at your convenience after the 4:00 p.m. check-in time. This makes it convenient for you to arrive at any time after check-in time - so if you want to check in late or come a day early arriving late at night - you could just make first tracks in the morning.

We provide total privacy for you starting with self check-in. If you need anything while you are here, just email us (we are open 7 days a week) or call/text our 24-hour emergency line.   We will communicate at the time of booking and provide helpful information and insider tips.  We hope you love Silver Star Mountain as much as we do!

Silver Star Village is friendly and casual.  Shop, enjoy the two coffee shops, the bars, restaurants, the gym, rental shops, etc.  Everything you need is here - but small enough to be very friendly and fun!

A 10-minute walk to the village.

On-Mountain Shuttle Bus: Continual looped service throughout Silver Star Mountain Resort is available daily during the winter season only. 

You can catch the shuttle in the Village every half hour into the evening ‚Äì so if you want to stop off for some apr√®s-ski, this free drive home is very convenient. You can also take this bus to the village.

Note - You can also flag down the shuttle bus anywhere along the route.

Thinking of having a party? This isn't the property for you. If we find that you are having a party or have violated the house rules regarding events and the quiet hours, you may be evicted without a refund of unused nights. Please make sure you are respecting the house rules and quiet hours. 

SkyLine Whole House is a fully equipped house with its own laundry facilities. Housekeeping is not included during your stay but if you require additional housekeeping during your stay it can be arranged at an additional cost.

Important Info:  The condos, townhomes, and mountain vacation homes that we rent and manage are privately owned with a wide variety of accommodation in a very popular and in-demand ski resort.

Lindsay, Diana, Teresa, Peter, Tierney and Tara make up the team at Silver Star Stays, a personalized reservation services company at Silver Star Mountain and the city of Vernon. Silver Star Stays is located on Silver Star Mountain and Lindsay lives right on Silver Star Mountain and loves calling Silver Star and the Okanagan home.  Not only do we love skiing, hiking, biking but also enjoy touring the Okanagan and an occasional winery or two.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
Helpful information, how to‚Äôs, emergency numbers, WI-FI password, etc will be provided in the information binder made available in the condo.

Reservation Policy and Rental Agreement

Check-In: 4:00 pm
Check-Out: 10:00 am

All our properties have keyless entries so you can arrive as late as you wish. You will be provided with driving instructions, door access codes, etc. at the time of final payment.  

Deposit and Cancellation Policy: To confirm your booking a non-refundable deposit is required.  

Once paid, both the deposit and final balance are non-refundable. We HIGHLY recommend cancellation insurance. We are fully licensed to provide cancellation insurance to our worldwide guests. If you are under 65, we recommend World Nomad Insurance which you can purchase by clicking the link on our website. World Nomad offers VERY affordable insurance coverage, and any nationality can purchase it.  

If you are a Canadian resident over 65 you may purchase Manulife Insurance on our website. You may also purchase cancellation insurance from your local insurance provider. Please note, as mentioned the deposit and final balance are non-refundable for any reason, which includes, but is not limited to, events such as weather, mountain closures, road conditions, missed flights, delayed flights, illness, accidents, etc.   

Occupancy: The property is limited to the maximum occupancy stated on the property and that you have confirmed at the time of booking. Due to COVID-19, provincial and regional restrictions may apply to your reservation and the number of occupants allowed. 

In BC, there could be up to a $2,000 fine for not adhering to current provincial and regional restrictions by local bylaw or RCMP. These restrictions are subject to change. 

If you have any questions about these restrictions or regulations, please ask. 

Just a reminder: NO Parties or Events ‚Äì this includes bachelor and bachelorette parties.

Failure to adhere to this house rule will result in eviction from the property with no refund and may result in extra charges. 

Smoking: All properties are strictly non-smoking or vaping inside. Failure to adhere to this policy will result in a $1000 fumigation charge. Please review your property's policy as to whether you can smoke outside the property or not on the property at all. This will be in the check-in information.  

Quiet Time: Please respect your neighbors. Quiet time is before 7:00 a.m. and after 10:00 p.m. With this being an active ski resort most people go to bed early and get up early to get first tracks. Most of us are used to living in single-family homes, so do not normally need to consider this. Thanks for respecting the peace and comfort of your fellow neighbors.  

Pets: Some of our properties are pet friendly and this is identified in the highlights of each property. An additional daily fee of $30 plus 13% taxes per pet/per day is charged.
  
Silver Star is very pet friendly; please ensure you pick up after your pet and have him/her on a leash. Dogs can go off-leash on all the snowshoe trails (which you often don‚Äôt need snowshoes for).  

Please note if there is pet hair found on the couches, beds, or excessively through the property, you will be charged an additional cleaning fee, up to and including having the carpets/couches steam cleaned if necessary.  

If pets are brought into non-pet friendly units a minimum charge of $1000 for fumigation will be charged.  

Excessive Cleaning: Please treat this vacation property as you would your own, by leaving it in good condition.  

As the occupants, you are responsible for all damage or disappearance of items during your stay. Any damage will be charged to your credit card, which you have provided in lieu of a damage deposit. If the property you‚Äôve rented is left in an excessively dirty condition you will be billed $35.00 plus taxes per hour of additional cleaning (over the normal time spent for a clean).  

Please advise us immediately if anything is damaged, missing, or broken at the time of check-in.  

As our guests are multi-nationals please understand that strong cooking odors from various spices are not allowed in our vacation properties. Should this policy not be adhered to and housekeeping advised that the property has retained some odors, you will be charged a minimum of $300 for this infraction. Thank you for your understanding. 

We thank you for your booking and wish you a wonderful stay. If you require anything during your stay, you can contact us 24/7. The contact information once you are on the mountain will be provided in your check-in information.

We will communicate at the time of booking and provide helpful information and insider tips.  We hope you love Silver Star Mountain as much as we do!

name: Halifornia House: Luxury by the lake

reviews.comments: Our family had a wonderful time at Halifornia House.  The cottage is beautiful and the location is outstanding.  Sunset views and a great outdoor living room with fireplace.  And Chris and Amanda are great hosts.  We're looking forward to our next stay.

photos.caption: Covered porch with views of the lake and outdoor propane fireplace
Living and Dining Room with wood burning fireplace (wine not included).
Main floor bedroom with view of the lake
Downstairs main bath - Just outside of downstairs bedroom, full steam shower.
Master bedroom with lake views and Soaker tub
Mirror Jack and Jill Bedrooms with Attached Bathroom
Jack and Jill (mirroring bedrooms with adjoining bath) Queen size.

primaryHost.about: My husband, Chris and I, live in Toronto, but our hearts are in Haliburton. We love cottage county and have so many great memories on Redstone Lake we want to share with our guests! We just finished building our dream cottage and hope you love it as much as we do!

sectionedDescription.description:
A modern, newly constructed lake house with 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, steam shower, a gym, library, and great outdoor space! Every room has great views of the lake. Gorgeous Redstone lake is fantastic for swimming and boating! Western exposure offers great sunsets every night! Large sandpit on the roadside for kids/lawn game and flat walk to the water! 20 minutes to Eagle Lake Store for groceries and LCBO and 30 minutes to downtown Haliburton. Find luxury by the lake here!

Modern contemporary feel with cottage charm.

3 Fireplaces 
 - 2 Outdoor 
         - 1 Propane in covered porch
         - 1 wood firepit
- 1 Indoor - wood burning 

8 person outdoor dining area.

sectionedDescription.description:
Located on the 6th floor of the building, Le Loft Pr√©sidentiel is accessible through a private elevator.

Located on the 6th floor of the building, Le Loft Pr√©sidentiel is accessible through a private elevator.
This spacious, ultra-modern 3,500 sq. Ft. Loft is located in the heart of downtown Montreal on Sainte-Catherine Street. Composed of 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms and a shower room.

Private Floor ‚Ä¢ Surface XXL ‚Ä¢ Ceiling Height 12 Feet ‚Ä¢ Quality Lighting System ‚Ä¢ Fully Equipped Kitchen ‚Ä¢ XXL Kitchen Island ‚Ä¢ Sonos Wireless Sound System .

Your reservation gives you the exclusive use of the apartment.

If you happen to have any questions, we're here for you. 
You can contact us by email or by phone from Monday to Friday, 9.30am-6pm.

The Holland Hotel is located in a historic building along St. Catherine Street, Montreal‚Äôs main downtown artery and commercial strip. The building features private elevator access and a prime location within the strip‚Äôs ground-floor retail shopping.

Peel Metro Station (Green Line) at 1 min walk from the hotel.

Simplissimmo is an agency specialized in fully furnished rental since more than 10 years in Montreal. For security purposes, we ask all our guests to provide the proof of their identity by sending us the picture of valid government ID and a selfie through our online registration form. This ID verification is mandatory to help us to fight against fraudulent reservation and Airbnb accounts hacking or theft. This registration form is sent 3 days before the arrival day on the email address associated to the Airbnb account. 
We thank you in advance for your cooperation.

It is strictly forbidden to smoke and/or consume drugs in the apartment.

 Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.

In the case of any of these rules are not respected, your security deposit of an amount of 2000$ will be retained and a formal complaint will be sent to Airbnb for non-respect of the house rules.

* The maximum occupancy must be respected in all time. By not complying with the house rules, your security deposit may be fully retained.

As a Hotel property, we will be requesting a security deposit with a credit card for the total amount of CAD$ 2000 along with a check ID verification. Following AIRBNB policy, this process, which cannot be voided, must be made directly on our website and up to 3 days before your arrival. For more info regarding this process please refer to the article "Host-required security deposits" from the "Security deposit" section.

Please carefully read and accept the following rules. The non-respect of these rules may result in the loss of your security deposit and an eviction without any refund !

Rules & Agreements :
 
‚òë I understand that security teams monitor cameras in common areas at all times and will intervene if unusual activity is detected or if the maximum capacity is not respected. I understand that failure to comply with these rules could result in eviction by our concierge or the police without notice. I understand that if an eviction is necessary, I will lose access to the rented unit without any eligibility for a refund and my security deposit will be retained in whole.

‚òë I hereby agree that departure must be done before 11AM on check-out day. I understand that I will be charged an additional fee in case of non-respect of this rule.

name: Brand new basement 1 bedroom suite

reviews.comments: Great place to stay for a longer term rental. Great value!

Walkway is poorly lighted with inconvenient entry in the dark, it's around back in a basement suite with drop offs, incomplete sidewalk so always trying to get around vehicles without tripping.  My daughter fell one night while visiting.  You have neighbors above and beside with little privacy.
Private, clean and spacious. Definitely a great host and unit.

The locks to get in should be fixed for future guest because my bf and I had a hard time getting into our Airbnb because the lock pin pad was not working properly. It took us a while to get in, every time. The place could have been cleaner. The floors were so dusty and dirty that our feet would be black from all the dirt it picked up. The toilet and bathtub were dirty, and the kitchen could have been cleaner as well. The location wasn‚Äôt too bad  but for what we paid, our overall experience could have been better.

It was great for our needs. We wanted somewhere quiet and private since we had a little one with us. We didn‚Äôt want to be in a shared space that might make it hard for others to cope with an energetic kid. All the facilities helped us settle in quickly and Moe responded quickly whenever we had any issues (which were very few - like setting up WiFi).

This place is great. Very spacious and well layed out. Nicely stocked kitchen and with nice appliances. A very central Surrey location with easy access to Highway 1 and other key routes. Moe was easy to communicate with. I stayed here for 7 nights while working and this place was a great base.
Awesome place to stay ü§ó
Die Wohnung entspricht den Erwartungen. Die K√ºche und der Fussboden h√§tten sauberer sein k√∂nnen.

name: Luxury Corner Suite! Awesome Views! New Listing.

reviews.comments: Beautiful place in a great area.  So many things to do and see.  Ten minutes from Banff.  Mike was a phenomenal host and listing was exactly as stated.  Will definitely rebook if ever in Alberta, Canada again.
We had a fantastic stay in Canmore. I highly recommend Mike‚Äôs condo. Solara is extremely nice, and the unit itself is beautiful. Perfect for a family vacation.

Mikes place is at a perfect location!  Easy to get around and walking distance to awesome restaurants. The place is great, very clean and has everything you need. Mike was also very helpful since the beginning and answered quickly when I had any questions. Totally recommend it!

Our stay was amazing, the condo was beautiful, fully stocked, walking distance to town and the scenery was amazing. I would highly recommend this unit to anyone looking for a nice vacation in the mountains, the town and views are amazing
Great appartment, super well equiped, confortable and clean. Nice terrasse. We loved everything. Thank you Mike!

No words can explain how well this property is provisioned. Truly a first class property. Overly well provisioned. Noting missing that you could possibly need. Walking distance to downtown Canmore but yet still far enough away that you feel you out in the mountains. Breathtaking views. We will definitely stay here again next time we come to Canmore. Recommend this property to anyone hands down over other locations we have tried before.

The condo was super clean, spacious and very modern. Truly home away from home. With huge windows in the sitting area the views were fantastic. I enjoyed the patio while grilling. The spice rack was fully loaded for your blending. Walking distance to literally everything. As a corner unit, it was very quiet. My family enjoyed the stay here. The space was adequate for 6 ppl. Can‚Äôt wait for summer 2023 to stay at Mike‚Äôs place again.
Kind Regards
Hugh BSc. PMP

Mike‚Äôs condo was super clean, spacious and very well stocked. Beautiful view of the trees from the patio and living room. Perfect if one wants to sit back and relax. This place was exactly what we were looking for our short weekend getaway to Canmore.
Everything was perfect.

This is a lovely condo, and a perfect size for two couples to share. I chose this spot mainly because of the corner views, and was not disappointed! There are dense trees on one side and mountains on the other. The kitchen was well equipped and we had everything we needed. The BBQ was easy to use as well, and the patio dining space was comfortable and inviting. I will definitely keep this unit in mind for future stays in Canmore.

reviews.comments: August and his wife were fantastic hosts. They make you feel like your part of the family. August was a genuine caring host and wants the guests to have the best stay possible. Great location as well!

The place was so filthy. Dust everywhere, you had to put your toilet paper in a bin beside the toilet. The kitchen was so dirty and grease everywhere! I had to make food in the dining table because there were stuff everywhere.
The host were nice but they live 4-5 people in the house and there are 13+ rooms. The host are really noisy, yelling in Chinese and working at night. Fixing things with tools. The pictures must be from when they bought the place because it does not look as nice!
The host were working and what I assume was his mom could not talk English so it was hard to find out of how to navigate the kitchen and ask for stuff.
Would never pay this much for something like that again.
Really a good place to enjoy. The hosts are really sweet and kind.
A really friendly host.
Doesn‚Äôt have any windows and bathroom is the worst basically it‚Äôs difficult to breathe downstairs

August has a great house at an awesome location. He has always helped us out whenever we needed any favors. The balcony upstairs has plenty of spaces and the house also has a lot of space to sit down and relax outside of your designated room. Overall it‚Äôs a fantastic place at a beer reasonable price :)
Quiet neighbourhood for evening walks to meet friendly people. Views and sunsets of the Fraser River.
Incredible house. Very clean, great location and with friendly company too. August was a very kind host
A little far from Vancouver but in a nice, quiet neighborhood. There was a bit of a wait to use the bathroom (since it was shared with other guests) but overall, you can't beat the price.

Liked the place its in quite neighborhood, nice view at night time. Close to richmond, vancouver and surrey. Enjoyed my stay here and would recommend anyone who have car and like to stay in quite place.

sectionedDescription.houseRules:
1. Change your shoes in the gate.

2. No smoking in the house.

3. No food in our cooker, need to Immediately clean the cookers and used dinnerware after use otherwise the guest will be forbidden to use our kitchen. 

4. Take off the kitchen fire before you leave kitchen.

5. Recycling items need to be cleaned before put into the recycling blue box.

6. Personal belonging should be labeled with room Number in fridge or public area otherwise items will be cleaned.

7. Be quite after 10PM.

8. Extra Toilet do not put in toilet.

9. Laundry need to be finished before 11 PM.

Thanks for your support.

reviews.comments: Cost effective accommodation. Friendly host and family.
Clean and great hospitality
I highly recommend it, good place to stay.
Excellent place to stay, really quite neighborhood , just a few steps (around 5 - 7 min) from bus stops for commuting cities around.

I had a great experience staying at August's place. The bedroom was perfect for one and was sparkling clean. The kitchen had all the required amenities. The most special part was the view from the balcony of the house. My only complaint is regarding the Wifi since it disconnected time and again inside the room. Overall, would definitely recommend staying at this place.
Good place to stay! Really welcoming.
Kind host

August is really welcoming and warm-hearted! I had a great stay here. I especially appreciate the yummy food I shared with August and other guests.
Thanks a lot!

additionalHouseRules:
1. Change your shoes in the gate.

2. No smoking in the house.

3. No food in our cooker, need to Immediately clean the cookers and used dinnerware after use otherwise the guest will be forbidden to use our kitchen. 

4. Take off the kitchen fire before you leave kitchen.

5. Recycling items need to be cleaned before put into the recycling blue box.

6. Personal belonging should be labeled with room Number in fridge or public area otherwise items will be cleaned.

7. Be quite after 10PM.

8. Extra Toilet do not put in toilet.

9. Laundry need to be finished before 11 PM.

Thanks for your support.

name: Rocky Mountain Estate

reviews.comments: Highly recommend. Go with family or a group of friends. You will have an amazing experience at the house, around town and in the mountains.
Amazing place for family get-togethers and very well maintained property with all the necessary amenities! Had an amazing stay :)
This place is amazing!
We had a spectacular experience staying at the Treehouse during our long weekend in Banff. The house itself is incredible and we couldn‚Äôt ask for more from the owners. Would 100% stay here again!!!
This place is amazing. It was well supplied with dishes etc. Our family did our Christmas there. Was so nice to walk in to find it all decorated for Christmas.

A magical location for a large group. The Tree House allowed a vacation with our adult children and their significant others from different cities to meet, combining shared time with privacy for all. The mountain views are astounding, as were the scale and finishes of the interior. The Christmas decorations added to an ambience which brought joy to all of us.
Location is easy access for Banff and the ski resorts. While the gourmet kitchen invites cooking, the Iron Goat (5 mins away) had great food and a friendly staff and was another way to make the experience feel homey! If you are cooking, review the cabinets before shopping -- plenty of basics were available from spices to pancake mix.

sectionedDescription.access:
In addition to listed amenities we also have:
Games room w/ pool table, pinball machine.  Cable, satellite and extensive music system and automated lighting are available as well. 

Kitchen appliances also include: coffee maker, popcorn maker, ice cream maker, waffle maker, bread maker, margarita machine, slow cooker, 3 dishwashers, 2 ovens, microwave, 2 temperature wine cooler, flat griddle and gas burners. Also steamer, iron, washing machine and dryer are available in laundry room.
sectionedDescription.description:
The Rocky Mountain Estate has 6 bedrooms.   It a log home with sauna, steam room and hot tub,  generous kitchen and dining room with fireplace. It is truly a pristine home.

For custom rental opportunities, please contact us directly.  This is a bespoke home and we welcome direct communication to make the trip right for you!  Maximum number of guests is 18.

List of beds and their sizes:
1. Master bedroom. - 1 King bed, 1 single Hide-a-bed
2. Guest  Suite - 1 king bed, 1 crib
3. Barnwood Room - Bunk Beds, Double over Double
4. Hickory Room - Bunk Beds, single over single, with Trundle bed underneath. 
5. Log Room - Bunk Beds, double over double.
6. Loft - Hide-a-bed in leather couch - sheets in loft closet and/or Hickory room closet
7. Nanny suite - Bunk Bed, Double over queen, Single Hide-a-bed

Beds have high quality mattresses with very comfortable bedding. 

*Please note - Our home is a refined private residence that is not available for wild partying. If the home is used disrespectfully; we reserve the right to withhold some or all of the damage deposit.

In addition to listed amenities we also have:
Games room w/ pool table, pinball machine.  Cable, satellite and extensive music system and automated lighting are available as well. 

Kitchen appliances also include: coffee maker, popcorn maker, ice cream maker, waffle maker, bread maker, margarita machine, slow cooker, 3 dishwashers, 2 ovens, microwave, 2 temperature wine cooler, flat griddle and gas burners. Also steamer, iron, washing machine and dryer are available in laundry room.

No street parking available. Maximum capacity - 7 cars. Garage has 3 car capacity. 

Note: the NUMBER of guests MUST be registered with owner prior to payment; If bringing more guests than registered, there shall be an additional charge, per guest, per day,  and possibly cancellation of the rental.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
- Quiets hours - 11pm
- This home is not intended for Partying
- NO Shoes allowed in the home
- All additional guests must be reported to owner 2 weeks prior to amend pricing. If more guests are at the property then initially reported immediate penalty or immediate cancellation of reservation is in place.
- Treat home with respect
- Check in and out documents must be completed, dated, signed, and given to property manager upon arrival and departure of property
- If any damage is caused during stay; immediately report damages to property manager.  As we prefer all damages are repaired prior to next guest arrival date.
